channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Twirlywoos
channel.desc: Twirling. Stop-motion preschool series. The Twirlywoos learn about twirling when they visit an ice rink. The Box brings them a grass skirt which takes its wearer for a twirl.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Something Special
channel.desc: Eye Test. Justin and his friends learn all about getting their eyes tested. Meanwhile, Mr Tumble helps Grandad Tumble with some new glasses when he loses his old pair.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Teletubbies
channel.desc: Music. Preschool series. The Teletubbies become a pop group and perform a song. In Tummy Tales, children watch a one-man band playing music and accompany him by playing their own.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: The Baby Club
channel.desc: Paper. Nigel and Baby Bear invite babies and their grown-ups to explore paper through discovery, play, song and story.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Maddie & Triggs
channel.desc: Bowling. It's bowling time! Dad thinks he's a pro - but he's the only one not scoring. Maddie and Triggs sing a doo-wop song to help him focus and find his strike.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Dylan's Playtime Adventures
channel.desc: Hotel Manager. Dylan the manager wants to help a guest enjoy their stay at his hotel, but he soon discovers that giving them a good night's sleep can be pretty exhausting.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Kiri and Lou
channel.desc: Ready Set Go. Kiri, Lou and Sorry have a running race, and Kiri is shocked to discover that their new friend is way faster than she is.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Vegesaurs
channel.desc: Lost. Ginger and the baby Pea-Rexes search for honeysuckles, leaving behind a trail of berries.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Fruit Bat. Not wanting to go to bed, Bluey tries to dream about being a nocturnal fruit bat so she can stay up all night long, and soon she finds herself flying through the night sky.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Hey Duggee
channel.desc: The News Badge. After learning that Duggee is making his yearly batch of blueberry jam, a tradition passed on from his great-aunt, the Squirrels decide to spread the news.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: The Game Catchers
channel.desc: Sourpuss. Alien blackboards show the Game Catchers how drawings come to life on their planet.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Roots and Fruits
channel.desc: Celery. Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's Celery performing We're Here to Grow.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Timmy Time
channel.desc: Timmy Finds Treasure. Timmy is a pirate captain and leads his chums on a treasure hunt to find the X that marks the spot.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Our Family
channel.desc: Queen Audrey Goes to the Beach. Audrey plays at being a queen and holds a royal tea party.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: My World Kitchen
channel.desc: Larry's Chinese Tofu, Egg and Prawn. Larry is cooking Chinese steamed tofu, egg and prawn. China is famous for its wonderful food so Larry's friends are very excited to try some.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Teeny Tiny Creatures with Chantelle and Rory
channel.desc: Grasshoppers. Chantelle meets a stick insect, while Rory and Sandy are out listening for grasshoppers.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Time for School
channel.desc: Oliver's Healthy Day. Oliver and his friends have a fun PE lesson with the school sports coach, Mr Beresford.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: What's in Your Bag?
channel.desc: Vet. Vet Hannah shows us how her ultrasound scanner can look at an animal's lungs and hearts to check that they are healthy.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Grace's Amazing Machines
channel.desc: Cleaning Machines. Series for young children that celebrates many different kinds of amazing machines. In this episode, Grace, show off three extraordinary machines that all clean things.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Yakka Dee!
channel.desc: Shoes. Dee encourages a friend to say 'shoes', and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. Dee see lots of different shoes - flashy shoes, dashy shoes, shiny shoes and even flying shoes.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Numberblocks
channel.desc: The Numberblocks Express. Children's animation. All aboard for a riotous railway ride as the Numberblocks try to stop a runaway train. Learn all the number bonds up to five.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Alphablocks
channel.desc: Book. Educational fun. OO and friends discover a talking book, some missing words and a pile of letters - can they put the story of Little Red Riding Hood back together.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Wonderblocks
channel.desc: Cluck! Secret Agent Chicken is on a mission to get into the hen house, but she doesn't have the right password. Can Go, Stop and Cluck help her crack it in time.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Colourblocks
channel.desc: Return of the Printing Crew. Black joins the Printing Crew. Learn how yellow, cyan, magenta and black work together in printing.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Hey Duggee
channel.desc: The Moving Badge. Snail is thrilled to be moving house, and the Squirrels help her.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Yukee
channel.desc: The Piano. Without her ukulele, Yukee struggles to come up with a tune for the words she wrote for a new song. Can the piano Sonny and Paulie the peacock bring to the Sunhouse be the answer.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Something Special
channel.desc: Beach, Boats and Birds. Justin and his friend take a boat trip to spot some wildlife. Meanwhile, Mr Tumble creates a beach in his garden, but things don't entirely go to plan.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Teletubbies
channel.desc: Football. Preschool series. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po play football. Their ball goes inside Home Dome, just as the Tubby Phone rings. It is time for a Tubby Phone Dance.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Andy's Safari Adventures
channel.desc: Andy and the Lions. Preschool wildlife series. Andy jets off to Africa in his safari-mobile to see how lions in the wild deal with flies. The agama lizard may have the solution.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
channel.desc: Waffle and the Kitten. Preschool comedy drama series. The Brooklyn-Bells lose the kitten they're looking after. Waffle knows it's at Mrs Hobbs's house, but Mrs Hobbs won't own up.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Topsy and Tim
channel.desc: All Change! Live-action children's show. Everything is changing as Grandma gets a new puppy and the twins prepare for the arrival of their new baby brother.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion
channel.desc: Raa Raa's Whistle Worries. Animation featuring Raa Raa, who lives in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Raa Raa is determined to copy all the noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: The Game Catchers
channel.desc: How Boring! The Game Catchers land on the planet of fairy tales to play mirror game.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Octonauts
channel.desc: Gulper Eels. Animated deep sea adventures with Captain Barnacles and his explorers. Hungry gulper eels and undersea tremors threaten Inkling and Kwazii.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Peter Rabbit
channel.desc: The Tale of the Grumpy Owl. Animated series. When Old Brown takes Peter's journal, Peter must choose between holding on to his most precious possession and saving a friend.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Hey Duggee
channel.desc: The Treehouse Badge. Animated preschool series. Duggee is cleaning the clubhouse, so the Squirrels take refuge in the treehouse, but it's getting a little bit cramped these days.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Vida the Vet
channel.desc: Sweetwood's Itchy Scratchies. When animal after animal show up at Vida's clinic with a mysterious rash, she's determined to find the cause. It's poison ivy.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Supertato
channel.desc: Trolley Cruise. Supertato, Carrot and Broccoli get free tickets to go on a luxurious trolley cruise, but it's actually a one-way ticket out of the supermarket from Evil Pea.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: All Out of Marmalade. Big Lizard shows Cosima a plant that's growing huge Proximan oranges.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Mojo Swoptops
channel.desc: Pizzas Away. Mojo needs to deliver a pizza to a very hard-to-reach island, but some stubborn seabirds have their eye on the pizza. Will Mojo have to go supersonic to get past them.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Phones. Grandad plays restaurant with the kids but struggles to order food on their app.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Ice Cream. Bluey and Bingo try to taste each other's each ice creams, but they're starting to melt.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Piripenguins
channel.desc: The Merguin. The Piripenguins fall under the spell of a magical Merguin, a mermaid-penguin, who has the ability to change their personality. But all is not as it seems.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Dodge's Pup School
channel.desc: Class Star. Dodge is eager to win the Class Star award, but how will he outshine Cherry the superstar at everything? Dodge discovers the real key to winning Class Star is by trying his best.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
channel.desc: Waffle's Day Out. Preschool comedy drama series. Waffle is disappointed he can't go swimming with Evie and sets off to find her.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Puffin Rock
channel.desc: Baba to the Rescue. Isabelle and Oona get distracted as they meet their friends. Baba takes Lala under his little wing and proves he can take care of himself now - and Lala too.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: JoJo & Gran Gran
channel.desc: It's Time to Write a Book. JoJo is at the library but can't find a book she would like to read. Gran Gran has a plan - why doesn't JoJo become an author and make her own book to read.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Moon and Me
channel.desc: Pepi Nana Crosses the Bridge. Mr Onion shows Pepi Nana his toy bridge. Pepi Nana wishes they could cross the bridge.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Clangers
channel.desc: Lonely as a Cloud. Stop-motion animation. Tiny, Small, the Froglets and Baby Dragon are having great fun playing games with the Cloud. Then Major calls them all in for bed.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: In the Night Garden
channel.desc: The Pontipines' Picnic. In a magical forest, characters have adventures. The Pontipines look for the perfect place to have a picnic. They call the Wottingers and invite them.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: CBeebies Bedtime Stories
channel.desc: Katherine and Nat Sciver-Brunt - Find Your Happy. England cricketers Katherine and Nat Sciver-Brunt read a Bedtime Story about finding happiness.
